name: Get Together! (read description)
description:
IMPORTANT!

installation instructions:

install the .zip file, and unpack it anywhere. (The game was made for windows, but it might be able to play on mac and linux machines)

run the game.

if not already done, resize the window untill you see a 'box' made of white bars at the top, bottom, left and right of the screen. If this is not the case you are able to resize the window, if this IS the case, just leave it. This step is essential for the game.

have fun!

expected play time: 5 minutes.
